/* Base styles */:root{--accent-color:#22D3EE;--text-color:#333;--bg-color:#f8f8f8;--header-bg:#fff;--card-bg:#fff;--border-color:#eee}*,*::before,*::after{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0}body{font-family:-apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,"Segoe UI",Roboto,Oxygen,Ubuntu,Cantarell,"Open Sans","Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;line-height:1.6;color:var(--text-color);background-color:var(--bg-color);-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;-moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale}main{max-width:1200px;margin:0 auto;padding:1rem}img{max-width:100%;height:auto;display:block}/* Header */header{background-color:var(--header-bg);padding:1rem 1rem;border-bottom:1px solid var(--border-color);text-align:center}header h1{color:var(--accent-color);font-size:2.2rem;margin:0;line-height:1}/* Hero Section */.hero{text-align:center;padding:2rem 0;background-color:var(--header-bg);margin-bottom:2rem;border-radius:8px;overflow:hidden}.hero img{width:100%;max-height:250px;object-fit:cover;margin-bottom:1.5rem;border-radius:8px}.hero h2{font-size:1.8rem;color:var(--text-color);margin-bottom:.5rem}.hero p{font-size:1.1rem;color:#666}/* Projects Section */#projects{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:1.5rem}#projects article{background-color:var(--card-bg);border-radius:8px;box-shadow:0 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.05);overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:1.5rem}#projects article img{width:100%;height:200px;object-fit:cover;border-bottom:1px solid var(--border-color);margin-bottom:1rem}#projects article h3{font-size:1.5rem;color:var(--accent-color);margin:0 1.5rem .5rem 1.5rem}#projects article p{font-size:1rem;color:#555;margin:0 1.5rem}/* Desktop styles */@media (min-width:768px){header h1{font-size:3rem}.hero{padding:3rem 0}.hero img{max-height:350px}.hero h2{font-size:2.5rem}.hero p{font-size:1.3rem}#projects{flex-direction:row;flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:center}#projects article{flex:1 1 calc(33% - 1.5rem);max-width:calc(33% - 1.5rem);min-width:300px}}@media (min-width:1024px){#projects article{flex:1 1 calc(33.333% - 1.5rem)}}

// This is a static site, so no complex JavaScript is needed.
// You can add interactive elements here if desired in the future.

assetsNeeded.heroImage: An abstract, light geometric pattern with neutral gray and white tones, suitable for a web hero background, without any people or text.
projectImages: A clean product mockup of a web application UI, displayed on a neutral background, free of people or neon colors.
A clean product mockup of a Java backend service dashboard or API documentation interface, displayed on a neutral background, free of people or neon colors.
A clean product mockup illustrating a data visualization tool or script output from a Python application, displayed on a neutral background, free of people or neon colors.
